title: Enhancing Customer Service Competencies: Transformations in Instructional Design and Online Community Utilization in the AI Era

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Analyze the impact of AI-based tools on the instructional design process and propose at least three strategies for workplace application.
Execute at least two practical strategies for gathering information and sharing knowledge in online communities (e.g., r/instructionaldesign)
Identify ethical issues that may arise when using AI and propose at least one solution
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
